channel.title: P2P on OKF

item.title: P2PU Meetup Berlin
item.description: P2PU crew will be back to Berlin for the 2011 Workshop. On 10 Nov they are hosting a meetup that is open to the public. They’d love to see as much of the Berlin free culture / hacker / edupunk crew as possible there. Please help spread the word, here’s the event page where attendees should RSVP: P2PU Meetup Berlin Thursday, 10 November 2011, 18:30 Supermarkt Berlin 64 Brunnenstra√üe, Berlin, DE 13355 ABOUT P2PU -
